Name.value: Better Starting Items Machine Gunner(A20 Experimental)

Description.value: Replaces the starting items with a backpack that contains better starting items for a modded A20. Machine Gunner: 7.62mm ammo:250, First Aid Bandage:5, Painkillers:2, Boiled Water:2, Can Chili:5, Torch:1, Duke's Note:1, Keystone Block:1
